```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
pacman::p_load(haven,
               sjPlot,
               dplyr)
iccs_simce <- read_dta("../input/data/original/iccs_simce.dta")

data=iccs_simce %>% select(PV1CIV,S_CITEFF,S_POLDISC,S_SOCMED,L_AUTGOV,S_INTRUST,L_DISLAW,S_GENEQL,S_ETHRGHT,L_ATTDIV,S_ELECPART,S_LEGACT,S_ILLACT) %>% as.data.frame
#summary(data)

data1=iccs_simce %>% select(PV1CIV,cod_depe2,S_HISCED,S_HISEI,S_HOMLIT,S_HINT) %>% as.data.frame
#S_HISCED = nivel educativo más alto
#S_HISEI = estatus ocupacional
#S_HINT = interés político de los padres (más alto)
```

```{r}
save(data, file= "../input/data/proc/data.Rdata")
save(data1, file= "../input/data/proc/data1.Rdata")
```
